Interface playn.core.TextLayout

Removed Methods
Rectangle lineBounds(int) @deprecated Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,float) and handle multiple lines separately.
int lineCount() @deprecated Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,float) and handle multiple lines separately.
 

Changed Methods
float ascent() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The number of pixels from the top of a line of text to the baseline.
IRectangle bounds() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the precise bounds of the text rendered by this layout.
float descent() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The number of pixels from the baseline to the bottom of a line of text.
TextFormat format() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The TextFormat used to lay out this text.
float height() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The height of a line of text.
float leading() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The number of pixels between the bottom of one line of text and the top of the next.
String text() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The text that was laid out.
float width() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. The width of the bounding box that contains all of the rendered text.
